channel.title: WebClient problem
channel.description:
Java plugin 1.6.0_18 Using JRE version 1.6.0_18-B07 Java HotSpot (TM) Client VM The user's home directory = C: \ Users \ Niklas -------------------------------------------------- - c: empty window systems f: final item in slutföringskö g: garbage collection h: show this help message l: Clas loader dump list m: print memory consumption o: utlösarloggning q: hide console r: download the new policy configuration s: dump system and deployment properties t: dump thread list v: dump thread thanks x: empty the cache loader Clas 0-5: set trace level to <n> -------------------------------------------------- -
load: class client.class are not. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass (Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass (Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass (Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode (Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet (Unknown Source) sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager AppletExecutionRunnable.run at $ (Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run (Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: Stream closed. at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.available (Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.available (Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedInputStream.available (Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.ChunkedInputStream.readAheadNonBlocking (Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.ChunkedInputStream.readAhead (Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.ChunkedInputStream.available (Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.MeteredStream.available (Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read (Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes (Unknown Source) sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access at $ 000 (Unknown Source) sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader at $ 1.run (Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged (Native Method) ... 7 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
I get this on my site whenever i try to play it comes! HELP PLEASE

item.title: WebClient problem
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

Try changing your HTML code to

[code] [Select]

YOUR TITLE 
<applet name="YOUR CLIENT NAME" width="765" height="503" archive="client.jar" code="client.class">
<param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m">
</applet>

</BODY>
</HTML>[/code]This worked for me when I had that same exact error.

Read full topic

item.title: WebClient problem
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:

I get this on my site whenever i try to play it comes! HELP PLEASE
